Class SourcesGalleryEvents 

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              de.eckhartarnold.client.SourcesGalleryEvents
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, ResizeListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
GalleryWidget 
public abstract class SourcesGalleryEvents
				
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
				
implements ResizeListener

Abstract base class for the gallery widget.

SourcesGalleryEvents is an "almost abstract" base class (or a "fat interface", if you prefer) for a gallery widget (e.g. GalleryWidget). It implements only the functionality of adding and removing gallery listeners and firing the events for those listeners.

Author:
ecki
